name: King Of Discount
description:
Control Mr.G to catch the falling money as much as possible.
Rotate the crank to catch falling maoney, then rotate the slider to put the money into wallet.
Do not collide the walls.
Control:
Move Left:A
Move Right:D
Jump:W
Crank Rotate Left:U
Crank Rotate Right:O
Slider Rotate Left:J
Slider Rotate Right:L
